SEARCH
Package com.monexel.expensetracker.controller

Class IncomeController

java.lang.Object
com.monexel.expensetracker.controller.IncomeController
@RestController @RequestMapping("/api/income") public class IncomeController extends Object
REST controller for managing income operations. Provides endpoints to add, update, delete, and retrieve income records for users, with optional date range filtering.

@author Surya Narayanan G

Version:
1.0

  • Method Details

    • addIncome

      @PostMapping("/addIncome") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<IncomeResponse> addIncome(@RequestBody @Valid @Valid IncomeRequest request)
      Adds a new income record.
      Parameters:
      request - the IncomeRequest containing income details
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity containing the created IncomeResponse and HTTP status 201 (Created) Example: 
               POST / api / income / addIncome

    • updateIncome

      @PutMapping("/updateIncome/{id}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<IncomeResponse> updateIncome(@PathVariable Long id, @RequestBody @Valid @Valid IncomeRequest request)
      Updates an existing income record by ID.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the income record to update
      request - the IncomeRequest with updated details
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity containing the updated IncomeResponse

    • deleteIncome

      @DeleteMapping("/deleteIncome/{id}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Void> deleteIncome(@PathVariable Long id)
      Deletes an income record by ID.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the income record to delete
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity with HTTP status 204 (No Content)

    • getIncomeById

      @GetMapping("getIncomeById/{id}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<IncomeResponse> getIncomeById(@PathVariable Long id)
      Retrieves an income record by ID.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the income record
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity containing the IncomeResponse

    • getAllIncomesByUser

      @GetMapping("/getAllIncomeByUser/{userId}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<List<IncomeResponse>> getAllIncomesByUser(@PathVariable Long userId, @RequestParam(required=false) LocalDate startDate, @RequestParam(required=false) LocalDate endDate)
      Retrieves all income records for a user, optionally filtered by date range.
      Parameters:
      userId - the ID of the user
      startDate - optional start date for filtering
      endDate - optional end date for filtering
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity containing a list of IncomeResponse Example: 
       GET /api/income/getAllIncomeByUser/1?startDate=2025-11-01invalid input: '&endDate'=2025-11-30
